query: SELECT id, userId, recordId, date, duration, distance, avgSpeed, maxSpeed, scooterId, LENGTH(gpsPointsJson) as gpsJsonLen, startTime, endTime FROM ridingRecords WHERE duration > 3600 OR distance > 100000;
